zone.line: have been possessed by frenzy and have destroyed my
miserable existence, but that my vow was heard
and I was reserved for vengeance. The laughter died
away when a well known and abhorred voice ap-
parently close to my ear, addressed me in an audible
whisper; "I am satisfied; yo miserable wretch, you
have determined to live and I am satisfied."
I darted towards the spot from which the
sound proceeded but the devil eluded my grasp; sud-
denly the broard disk of the moon arose and shone
fully upon his ghastly and distorted shape as he fled
I pursued him; and for many months this
has been my task. Guided by a slight clue I follow
